column5: I have used Gulp Leeches several times for Smallmouth in rivers without any luck.  How do you guys rig them and present them for SMB???  Thanks  Paul
drop shot rig, hooked one through the nose (you can see the fake sucker on the nose, make sure the hook goes through it)  then just lightly bounce the line n wait for tiks
drop shot.  I do not go through the sucker hole as I find you lose too many too quickly.  I actually thread it on the hook like you would a worm.  I used them today in the rain and went 4 for 8.
really eh? i will give that a try! are you talking about the 5"?
I use both. I have better success with the 3"  but they are both good.
